name: Grok Imagine Image to Video Generator Kie AI
description:
Generates 6 seconds long videos from a local input image and a text prompt using Grok Imagine through the Kie.ai API.
Pricing (as of November 2025): ~$0.10 per 6-second video.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if video generation is complete). Default: 5

prompt.description: The text prompt describing the video motion. Max length : 5000 characters.

filename.description: Optional base filename for the created video (without extension). Defaults to None (uses task_id)

input_image_path.description: Required local path to input reference image for video generation. Accepted types: .jpeg, .png, and .webp. Max size: 10.0MB

mode.description: Optional video mode. Must be one of 'fun' or 'normal' ('spicy' not supported). Default: 'normal'

local_path.description: Local path to the downloaded first video file

task_id.description: The task ID from the API
